definition: all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards

sentences.english: It is a common consensus reached by all the political parties of India.
sentences.chinese: 印度朝野各党派对此有明确共识。

sentences.english: He emphasized that this is not only the stance of the Macedonian government but also the consensus of the country's ruling and opposition parties.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅是马政府的立场，也是马朝野各政党的共识。

sentences.english: The blame, he said, lay both in George W.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马说，布什当政时期的美国朝野都应受到指责。

sentences.english: In Han dynasty, fencing was more favored by the court and the commonalty and many people were worldly renowned.
sentences.chinese: 汉趄，击剑更是朝野风行，不少人以便术显名于天下。

definition: laws and discipline of imperial court
to accuse of misconduct (in official task)/to impeach
national politics/archaic rank, "Minister of State"/common given name
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
to dismiss from office/to ban/to reject
